meanings.part_of_speech: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb

translation.Burmese: မနာလိုအားရစေခြင်း

kanji_explanation: The first kanji means envy or jealousy and carries the sense of wanting what someone else has. It shows up in うらやましい, the adjective for feeling envious, where the kanji gives the emotional sense of longing. You also see it in せんぼう, a noun that emphasizes admiration mixed with covetousness. In both words this character adds the core idea of yearning for another's possession or situation.

explanations.explanation: The word "うらやむ" means to feel envy or to be jealous of someone. It is used when you notice something admirable or desirable about others' possessions, status, achievements or qualities, and you wish you had them too. It's a common feeling when you see someone excelling in areas you wish you could excel in.
explanations.youtube_description: Learn how to use the Japanese word 羨む (うらやむ) in everyday conversations! In this video, we'll explore its meanings, kanji breakdowns, and collocations to help you master this essential vocabulary. Whether you're a beginner or looking to expand your Japanese skills, this video is perfect for you. Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more language learning content!
explanations.motivation: The word we'll be learning in this section is うらやむ, which you will often hear in situations when discussing others' achievements, possessions, or qualities that provoke feelings of envy or admiration.
explanations.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonym of the word うらやむ is "しっとする" which also means to be jealous or envious. While "うらやむ" focuses more on the feeling of desiring what others have, "しっとする" can sometimes carry a more negative connotation, implying spitefulness or resentment.
explanations.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonym of the word うらやむ is "うやまう" which means to respect. While "うらやむ" implies a sense of longing or envy, "うやまう" reflects admiration or acknowledgment of someone's worth or abilities, devoid of jealousy.

examples.kanji: 彼は友達を羨んでいます。
examples.furigana: 彼(かれ)は友達(ともだち)を羨(うらや)んでいます。

translation.Japanese: 彼は友達を羨んでいます。
translation.English: He is envious of his friend.
translation.Vietnamese: Anh ấy ghen tị với bạn của mình.
translation.Burmese: သူသည် သူ၏ သူငယ်ချင်းကို မနာလိုသည်။
translation.Hindi: वह अपने दोस्त से ईर्ष्या करता है।
translation.Spanish: Él está envidioso de su amigo.

examples.kanji: 彼は友達の成功を羨む。
examples.furigana: 彼(かれ)は友達(ともだち)の成功(せいこう)を羨(うらや)む。

translation.Japanese: 彼は友達の成功を羨む。
translation.Persian: او به موفقیت دوستش حسادت می‌کند.
translation.Nepali: उ उनी साथीको सफलतालाई डाहा गर्छन्।
translation.Filipino: Naiinggit siya sa tagumpay ng kanyang kaibigan.
translation.Vietnamese: Anh ấy ghen tị với thành công của bạn mình.
translation.Burmese: တော်သူငယ်ချင်းရဲ့ အောင်မြင်မှုကို မနာလိုဖြစ်တယ်။
translation.Hindi: वह अपने दोस्त की सफलता से जलन करता है।
translation.French: Il envie le succès de son ami.
translation.Spanish: Él envidia el éxito de su amigo.
translation.Bengali: সে তার বন্ধুর সফলতাকে হিংসা করে।

examples.furigana: 彼(かれ)は友達(ともだち)を羨(うらや)む。

translation.Vietnamese: Anh ấy ghen tị với bạn của mình.
translation.Burmese: သူငယ်ချင်းကို မနာလိုသည်။
translation.Hindi: वह अपने दोस्त से ईर्ष्या करता है।

examples.kanji: 私は時々他人を羨みます。
examples.furigana: 私(わたし)は時々(ときどき)他人(たにん)を羨(うらや)みます。

translation.Japanese: 私は時々他人を羨みます。
translation.Persian: من گاهی اوقات به دیگران حسادت می‌کنم.
translation.Indonesian: Saya kadang-kadang iri dengan orang lain.
translation.Filipino: Paminsan-minsan na naiinggit ako sa iba.
translation.Vietnamese: Thỉnh thoảng tôi ghen tị với người khác.
translation.Burmese: ကျွန်ုပ်က တခါတစ၊ အခြားသူများကိုမန်ဘွယ်ပါတယ်။
translation.Hindi: मैं कभी-कभी दूसरों से ईर्ष्या करता हूँ।
translation.Spanish: A veces, envidio a los demás.
translation.Bengali: আমি মাঝে মাঝে অন্যদের ঈর্ষা করি।

examples.kanji: 彼は友達の結果を羨む。
examples.furigana: 彼(かれ)は友達(ともだち)の結果(けっか)を羨(うらや)む。

translation.Japanese: 彼は友達の結果を羨む。
translation.Persian: او به نتایج دوستش حسادت می‌کند.
translation.Nepali: उ अाफ्नो साथीको परिणामलाई डाह गर्छ।
translation.Filipino: Naiinggit siya sa resulta ng kaibigan niya.
translation.Vietnamese: Anh ấy ghen tị với kết quả của bạn mình.
translation.Burmese: သူသည် သူငယ်ချင်းရဲ့ ရလာဒ်ကို မနာလို ကြည့်ရှုသည်။
translation.Hindi: वह अपने दोस्त के परिणाम से ईर्ष्या करता है।
translation.French: Il envie les résultats de son ami.
translation.Spanish: Él envidia los resultados de su amigo.
translation.Bengali: সে তার বন্ধুর ফলাফলকে ঈর্ষা করে।

meanings.part_of_speech: Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
Godan verb with 'u' ending, Transitive verb
